remarks: A representation of explicit substitution of a class for a variable, inferred from an implicit substitution hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2004.)
statement:
ceqsexg.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
ceqsexg.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsexg $p |- ( A e. V -> ( E. x ( x = A /\ ph ) <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
